sources.title: Dead Drop | Full Movie | Steven Seagal Action | True Justice Series
sources.description:
Dead Drop - Kane continues to track the suitcase nukes, but now suspects that his contact inside the CIA may be working against him. Kane knows he’s running out of time and teams up with an old friend to stop the suitcase nukes from reaching their prospective buyers. Kane knows The Ghost is now closer than ever.
2010.  Stars: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind, William 'Big Sleeps' Stewart, Meghan Ory, Warren Christie

metadata.Plot: After surviving a fall from a plane 3000-feet over the ocean, a former CIA operative turned government contractor re-infiltrates a dangerous North Mexican drug trafficking ring to find his own killer. With his memory unraveling, he descends into a murderous rampage while trying to uncover the truth. Who threw him from the plane? Was it his best friend?
metadata.Actors: Luke Goss, Nestor Carbonell, Cole Hauser, David Del Rio
